Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Ashland/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Ashland/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
